page.title: 20COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: The {Central Wales Railway Line} passes through Knighton.It runs from Shrewsbury to Swansea. This line is very important to the inhabitants of Knighton as the mail is carried by rail.The second class mail takes far longer to arrive at its destination now that all mail has to be sent to Shrewsbury to be sorted.Knighton Post Office has thirteen postmen delivering mail on foot and by van to outlying farms.The Post Office is open from 9a.m. to 5.30 p.m.each day except Wednesdays and Saturdays when it is closed for half a day. We have a Television Transmitter at Knighton.It beams programmes to parts of the area who were having difficulty in receiving transmissions from the main transmitter in Ledbury. We also have an automatic Telephone Exchange situated near the town.
